title: Apocalypse Special Forces - Novel Updates
author: 幻境城主
description: In life, there will always be a way out! The fire of apocalypse descends on earth, causing numerous mutations of living species. The dead are back up standing, having turned into zombies. They launch attacks on their past species. How would humans, the bottom of the food chain, survive? Facing fierce mutant beasts, strange genetically modified plants and endless waves of zombies, how long will human civilization last? Ou Yang Feng, a soldier from the special forces, before the apocalypse, will receive the “Blade of Apocalypse” and lead on the journey to save human civilization and fight the enemy behind the apocalypse…>
